name: Abdallah Kamhawi
main: Abdallah Kamhawi is a dual degree student in Master of Science in Digital and Material Technologies and Master of Architecture at the University of Michiganâ€™s Taubman College of Architecture and Urban Planning. He holds a Bachelor of Science in Architectural Engineering from Ain Shams University in Egypt. Abdallah has worked professionally with firms in the Middle East on various project types and scales. He is interested in exploring the potentials of computational design methods and digital fabrication technologies to improve the built environment.
sub: At ADR, Abdallah will be developing the human-robot collaborative assembly workcell, outfitting new hardware for increased safety, additional robot processes, and a more streamlined fabrication workflow. He will also be leading on-site construction efforts for future projects at ADR.
